name: Star-Molding Worm
desc: Basic ATK and Skill DMG taken by enemy targets increase by 100%. "Hivespawn" appears in the Action Order: when ally targets gain or consume Skill Points, "Hivespawn" gains 1 Hits Per Action for the next attack. At the start of the turn, "Hivespawn" deals Wind DMG equal to 500% base DMG to one random enemy for each Hit Per Action, and grants a Shield equal to 3% of respective Max HP for all allies. "Hivespawn"'s Hits Per Action will not be less than 10.
